channel.title: Comments on: No money, moâ€™ problems: Your precious flower(s)
channel.description: I do! Want my wedding to look fabulous. I don't! Have $20,000 to spend.

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/no-money-mo-problems-your-precious-flowers/#comment-15">Denys</a>.
I'm going to do a tutorial on it soon! It was really easy! I did like, 20 of them during a special hour long episode of "Keeping Up with the Kardashians."
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Denys.

I’m going to do a tutorial on it soon! It was really easy! I did like, 20 of them during a special hour long episode of “Keeping Up with the Kardashians.”

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/no-money-mo-problems-your-precious-flowers/#comment-18">Missy</a>.
Personally, I don't think the engagement ring is part of the actual wedding budget. All of my budget research only includes wedding bands, so I think that agrees. Generally, an engagement ring is purchased pretty far in advance, so it's a separate expense. Plus, if your parents are paying for the wedding, they aren't going to buy your engagement ring too. Wedding bands? Yes. Engagement rings? Probably not. In the end, if you're paying for everything, it's six in one hand, half a dozen in the other.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Missy.

Personally, I don’t think the engagement ring is part of the actual wedding budget. All of my budget research only includes wedding bands, so I think that agrees. Generally, an engagement ring is purchased pretty far in advance, so it’s a separate expense. Plus, if your parents are paying for the wedding, they aren’t going to buy your engagement ring too. Wedding bands? Yes. Engagement rings? Probably not. In the end, if you’re paying for everything, it’s six in one hand, half a dozen in the other.

item.title: By: Missy
item.dc:creator: Missy
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/no-money-mo-problems-your-precious-flowers/#comment-16">Denys</a>.
Of course you should include that cost. You would include the cost of the wedding rings, right?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Denys.

Of course you should include that cost. You would include the cost of the wedding rings, right?

item.title: By: Missy
item.dc:creator: Missy
item.description: We didn't have to buy our vases. The florist loaned them to us. Maybe girls can ask their florist if this is an option. It saved money. The only downside is that people can take the arrangements home, but not the containers.
item.content:encoded: We didn’t have to buy our vases. The florist loaned them to us. Maybe girls can ask their florist if this is an option. It saved money. The only downside is that people can take the arrangements home, but not the containers.

item.title: By: Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: Also, do you think that the price of the engagement ring should be included in how much a couple actually spent on their wedding? Since, it's that ring that starts the whole thing.
item.content:encoded: Also, do you think that the price of the engagement ring should be included in how much a couple actually spent on their wedding? Since, it’s that ring that starts the whole thing.
